name: Glnce
overview:
Glnce gives you the power to share & discover the products you love.

But wait… theres more to it.

As an online shopper you rarely have an identity when visiting a store. Shopping isn’t a unique experience tailored around you and your style.

Glnce builds the tools that help retailers establish a personal connection at the moments online when it really matters. Retailers will now be able to show the products that actually make sense to you and your style.

All you do is put the things you love into one easily managed profile. That’s it!

Once we learn enough about your style and interests you can enjoy surfing the web seeing only the products are meant for you.
